document.title: Money Management in the Black Community: Getting Back to Where We Used to Be
document.abstract: This session will address issues associated with credit, debt, and wealth management in the African American community. By taking a historical perspective on debt and money management amongst blacks, the session will highlight the important role of entrepreneurship and zero debt in the black community in former years, and provide tips and tools on how we can reclaim our attitude and disposition toward effective money and debt management.

field.name: location
field.value: Carolyn P. Brown Memorial University Center
